mapper.insert: insert into weizu_location( user_id, latitude, longitude, location_info, create_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{locationInfo}, now() )
mapper.select: select la.id as id, la.latitude as latitude, wu.nick_name as name, la.longitude as longitude, wu.avatar_url as iconPath from weizu_location la left join weizu_user wu on la.user_id=wu.id where la.id in(select max(id) from weizu_location group by user_id)
